channel.title: Left 4 Dead 2
channel.description:
Anyone out there who wants to shake the dust off this game and play with a couple friends and I tonight? We play pretty competively, so keep moving or you're probably going to get left behind (meaning don't stick back just because you saw a Jockey and a Smoker and want to kill them, let them chase you and if you get caught we'll turn around and save you. Don't stand around and waste time). We'll be playing Versus mainly, maybe switching to Scavenge, Survival, or the Four Swordsmen Mutation throughout the night.
I can offer some tips or answer questions if anyone needs them.
We'll start playing around 6 or 7 P.M. (Central time). I should have a friend or two joining already so just send me a message or post if you wanna join in. Probably playing through at least two campaigns.
Oh and just for some extra info new DLC is coming out soon :)
A few tips when playing with us:
[ul][li]Unless you can 100% crown the Witch, don't shoot it.[/li] [li]If you find an area with multiple pipe bombs/molotovs, call it out and aid the others in retrieving them.[/li] [li]Grab a shotgun on common Tank stages. Save your molotov on these stages as well.[/li] [li]Don't shoot a Boomer unless he is far enough away or you have to.[/li] [li]Use the melee button on Smokers, Hunters, and Jockeys attacking the Survivors to get them off, then keep doing it and shooting until they are dead.[/li][/ul]

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Would love to join, bad thing is I dont have it for my xbox only for my pc

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

-Nothing:

I have it, and my total playtime on it is like 2 hours lol…because it sucks.

Then you haven’t played it enough. Yes the game has it’s physics errors, such as a Charger clearly hitting a Survivor but it registers as not hitting them. But you’d be surprised about the strategy required in this game to do well on a Versus match.

Read full topic

@chassy13 wrote:

Anyone out there who wants to shake the dust off this game and play with a couple friends and I tonight? We play pretty competively, so keep moving or you’re probably going to get left behind (meaning don’t stick back just because you saw a Jockey and a Smoker and want to kill them, let them chase you and if you get caught we’ll turn around and save you. We’ll start playing around 6 or 7 P.M. (Central time). I should have a friend or two joining already so just send me a message or post if you wanna join in. Probably playing through at least two campaigns.

Oh and just for some extra info new DLC is coming out soon
